name: Phantasm (Merlin Ahrenadel)
description:
Play as David Brown, a private investigator and former officer whose son is suspected of murdering his girlfriend. It’s the night before the trial, and all evidence points to his guilt. When all hope seems lost, you receive word from your former partner, Eric White, that his organization has a way to help.

D.I.V.E., a top secret machine developed for use by the WATCHDOG Corps that can be used to view a person’s memories directly. All he needs is someone to help him test it, someone with combat experience and a strong sense of personal justice. In exchange for helping him refine the machine and gather evidence on cold cases, he’ll allow you to use it to clear your son’s name by examining the memories directly.

With time of the essence and the warped environments of criminal minds as your battlefield, will you be capable of discovering the truth? And even more important, do you really even want to?

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

ESC - Menu

E - Analyze/Interact

Right Click - Open Revolver Menu

Left Click - Confirm Selection / Use Last Revolver Action

Mouse Wheel - Select Revolver Action
